summary: Detailed implementation plan for building a sophisticated federal-local conflict coordination platform. Covers complete system architecture including database schema, PHP backend APIs for authentication, project management, conflict tracking, and AI analysis, along with role-based frontend dashboards using HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. Includes security configurations, notification system, analytics with Chart.js visualizations, and comprehensive verification plan. The plan addresses all MVP features: user authentication, project management, conflict reporting, AI-powered analysis, notifications, and analytics dashboard.
